import classNames from 'classnames/bind'; import styles from './Header.module.scss'; import stylesModal from '../Modal/Modal.module.scss'; import image from '@/assets/images'; import Modal from '../Modal'; import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; function Header() { const cx = classNames.bind({ ...styles, ...stylesModal }); const [stateSearch, setStateSearch] = useState(false); const modalRegister = useRef(); const modalLogin = useRef(); const modalSearch = useRef(); const handleSearchModal = () => { setStateSearch(!stateSearch); console.log(stateSearch); if (stateSearch) { modalSearch.current.style.display = 'flex'; } else { modalSearch.current.style.display = 'none'; } }; const handleRegister = () => { handleCloseLogin(); modalRegister.current.openModal(); }; const handleLogin = () => { modalLogin.current.openModal(); }; const handleCloseRegister = () => { modalRegister.current.closeModal(); }; const handleCloseLogin = () => { modalLogin.current.closeModal(); }; return (
